is it really wrong to take a 
photograph of everything you do?

is it wrong to take a snapshot 
of every meal you've ever eaten
and then post it onto the internet?
i don't know if it's right or wrong
but there's one thing i do know it's very popular

oh hello there welcome everyone 
yes we are back together once again

for our end of week english addict quick 
fix not a long one it is a short one

coming to you live from the birthplace of the 
english language which just happens to be england

is it wrong to take photographs of everything 
you do and then post it on the internet i

know a lot of people these days they love taking 
photographs of everything relating to their lives

their daily events and then they post them on 
the internet i suppose the surprising thing is

a lot of people like looking at it looking at all 
of the things that they are posting even if it

seems like something that's trivial or small they 
will still take a photograph of it and post it

onto the internet i suppose i should i should take 
a photograph of myself today so here we go i'm

going to take a photograph of me right now i know 
it's a little self-centred and maybe narcissistic

but i'm going to do it because today is well 
it's a day that's filled with happiness and

maybe a little bit of sadness as well so 
there we go mr duncan smile say cheese cheese
and there it is would you like to see it

i will never forget i will 
never forget this moment of time

there i am can you see me in 
all my wonderful awfulness

oh dear maybe i should delete it maybe

this is mr duncan in england how are you today 
are you okay i hope so are you feeling happy

well are you in a good mood i suppose you 
should be there are many reasons why you

might be in a good mood today i can think 
of at least two one reason you are alive

that's pretty cool i think that's a 
pretty good thing to be pleased about

if you wake up in the morning you slowly open your 
eyes always make sure the first thing you do is

smile because it is lovely because you know 
you are going to get another day of life

think of all the people that didn't wake up this 
morning think of all the people who will never

open their eyes again so so suddenly 
everything seems really nice another

good thing of course is we are here together

but i suppose also maybe it's a little bit

because on sunday of course i will be with you

hopefully you as well as we celebrate

i still can't believe this every time 
i say it it seems unreal 15 years

on youtube i don't know how many people are still

having been here on this website for 15 years 
i wonder how many people are still here doing

regular things maybe they are publishing 
regular videos or doing live streams but

i wonder how many people who've been doing

15 years later my name is duncan i love english 
i am an english addict and i have a feeling

you might be as well oh i've just thought

because we've reached the end of 
the week which means it's friday

lots of fireworks will be going off this weekend

youtube and of course today it is the end of 
the week the weekend is just around the corner

i think you might be quite pleased about that 
i think so we've had some really weird weather

over the last 24 hours a lot of rain has fallen

has fallen over the past 48 hours here we've had 
a lot of rain but of course when you get rain

and if there is a little bit of 
sunshine as well you can also get

a beautiful rainbow would you like to see 
the rainbow that i filmed just over one hour

before coming on here now so there it is 
there is the view from my living room window

and we we had the most amazing rainbow it's 
almost as if the sun and the rain wanted to

say goodbye to my english addict quick fix with a 
little bit of style and maybe some beauty as well

the rainbow i don't know what it is 
every time i see a rainbow i always feel

what's the word i'm looking for uplifted i always 
feel uplifted whenever i see a rainbow i don't

know why maybe because it's a little bit of nature 
a little bit of magic saying hello look at me i'm

nature and i'm really beautiful in 
fact for most of the time nature is

rather nice and we also had a lovely rainbow

look oh yes there it is you can see it's quite 
windy but we have the most glorious rainbow and

as i said just i love rainbows so much you might 
also notice there is a rainbow on my t-shirt today

it's very nice also because it's windy the 
leaves are now starting to fall from the trees

shall we have a look at that okay so there 
you can see some of the cows at the back

of the field this was this morning the view 
outside the window and you can see the cows

are there and also you might be able to see the 
leaves falling from the trees as the wind blows

so a rather nice scene today you will notice the 
leaves in the distance are blowing from the trees

as as autumn slowly moves on i don't know what's 
happening this year we are having a very strange

autumn it seems to be taking forever for 
the leaves to fall from the trees however

whilst it is here we will enjoy it we will 
enjoy the beautiful weather whilst it lasts

please let me know so we are having an anniversary 
today a little anniversary is taking place

and i thought we would have a look at some 
words and maybe some phrases as well connected

to anniversary an anniversary is a thing that 
is often commemorated something that happened

in the past that you are remembering quite 
often an anniversary will be a happy thing

it will be a joyous event something that people 
want to celebrate and remember fondly however an

anniversary can also be something solemn something 
unhappy that happened in the past so not all

anniversaries are happy events it is possible also 
to have an unhappy anniversary another word we can

use as well milestone when you reach a certain 
point maybe you reach a certain point of time

in your relationship you reach a milestone 
you reach a point of time that is significant

in some way so we can say anniversary we 
can also say milestone you have reached

a milestone it is a point that is significant 
for example on sunday i will reach a milestone

with my 15th anniversary on youtube 15 
years i still can't believe it i can't

we could also say landmark as well 
an anniversary can be a landmark

a special moment of time is a landmark it is a 
moment of time that comes and it is something that

you want to remember or to celebrate a special 
moment of time that comes along is a landmark

you might also say high point you might 
have a high point a moment that you want

to celebrate perhaps it is the anniversary of 
your wedding or maybe the anniversary of your

graduation from university maybe it is 
the anniversary of meeting your special

other maybe your boyfriend girlfriend you meet 
your significant other maybe you want to celebrate

that maybe that is a high point it is a moment of 
time that is memorable another way of describing

it of course is significant we can say that 
something is significant a significant moment a

significant moment of time so when we use the word 
significant we normally mean something important

something that is important to one person or 
maybe a group of people so a significant moment

is an important moment it's a moment you want to 
remember it's a moment you don't want to forget

historic we can say that something 
is a historic or an historic

event mr duncan why do you say an 
historic shouldn't it be historic

not necessarily it's one of those things that 
english is famous for one of those strange

things that english is well known for so we often

something you want to remember i don't think

i don't think we can say that my my youtube

something that is historic is something that will

so a momentous achievement is something

and that is why we use that word here's another

watershed you might have a watershed moment

we often use this to show that something has

is significant for a certain reason

is a watershed moment so your watershed moment

it can be a watershed moment maybe a moment that

moment we can also say that something you want

an anniversary can be a defining moment when you

thing you define you explain something clearly you

is a moment that you remember clearly a moment you 
don't forget or maybe a moment you can't forget
so a defining moment is a moment where something

amazing happens and perhaps you 
want to remember it forever and ever

finally we have turning point you 
can have a turning point in your life

perhaps you are looking for a new idea 
maybe something you want to do in your life

maybe you want to have some sort of change you 
want to make a change in your life you want to

do something different we can call that a turning 
point perhaps you reach a certain anniversary that

is special or maybe you learn some new skills 
that allow you to do something new in your life

then that is a turning point it is a point where 
things around you all of the things in your life

change quite often we will use this 
in a positive way so we will often use

turning point in a positive way it means things 
change in a good way or in a positive way
